name: requestBody
desc: The JSON contents you submit with the request to the App Store.

items.name: password
items.desc: Your appâ€™s shared secret, which is a hexadecimal string. For more information about the shared secret, see Generate a Receipt Validation Code.

items.name: exclude-old-transactions
items.desc: Set this value to true for the response to include only the latest renewal transaction for any subscriptions. Use this field only for app receipts that contain auto-renewable subscriptions.
